mapper.insert: insert into employee (name, username, password, phone, sex, id_number, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) value (#{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select:
select * from employee
name like contract('%', #{name}, '%')
